channel.title: [PI]Item Req's
channel.description:
I'm using a PI base. I know how to code most things but this is troubling me. I'm trying to change the item requirement's for item's and prayer, For example.
1. When you wear dragon boot's, it allows you to wear them at one defence. (I want it to be 60). 2. To use turmoil, it allows you to use the prayer at 70 prayer. (I want it to be 95).
So if you know what to do please email me at: prohax101@gmail.com or just leave a comment.
- Thank you.

item.title: [PI]Item Req's
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

ItemAssistant.Java

public void getRequirements(String itemName, int itemId) {

Add dragon boots to the switch statement like so

case 11732: // Dragon boots c.defenceLevelReq = 60; break;

For Turmoil try Clickingbuttons.java.

item.title: [PI]Item Req's

item.description:
@DcnScape wrote:

I’m using a PI base. I know how to code most things but this is troubling me. I’m trying to change the item requirement’s for item’s and prayer, For example.

  2. To use turmoil, it allows you to use the prayer at 70 prayer. (I want it to be 95).
